name: Verecchia v. De Siato (et al., Appellants)

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Verecchia v. De Siato (et al., Appellants).

opinions.text:
Per Otjriam,
The order granting a new trial is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Lewis of the court below.
opinions.author: Per Otjriam,

attorneys: Joseph W. Henderson, with him Bawle & Henderson and L. Stanley Mauger, for appellant.
Milford J. Meyer, with him Robert M. Bernstein, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Verecchia v. De Siato (et al., Appellants).
Argued November 27, 1945.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Joseph W. Henderson, with him Bawle & Henderson and L. Stanley Mauger, for appellant.
Milford J. Meyer, with him Robert M. Bernstein, for appellee.
January 7, 1946:
